item.title: Public MongoDB Data
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Database authentication, or the lack there of: There’s a total of 595.2 TB of data exposed on the Internet via publicly accessible MongoDB instances that don’t have any form of authentication. From Shodan: It’s the Data, Stupid!
item.content:encoded:
Database authentication, or the lack there of:

There’s a total of 595.2 TB of data exposed on the Internet via publicly accessible MongoDB instances that don’t have any form of authentication.

From Shodan: It’s the Data, Stupid!

item.title: Shodan Stream
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Shodan is providing a stream of their data: Using the Streaming API from Shodan you can directly subscribe to the raw data feed from the crawlers! The feed streams between 400-500 banners every second and depending on your API plan you have access to all or a fraction of it. It is surprising what has […]
item.content:encoded:
Shodan is providing a stream of their data:

Using the Streaming API from Shodan you can directly subscribe to the raw data feed from the crawlers! The feed streams between 400-500 banners every second and depending on your API plan you have access to all or a fraction of it.

It is surprising what has been connected to the Internet.
